com.cmput301f17t07.ingroove.DataManagers

Class RelationshipManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301f17t07.ingroove.DataManagers.RelationshipManager

  • public class RelationshipManager
extends java.lang.Object
    [Model Class] Class that managers the relationships between users. The class handles all interactions with follow objects and updates the server upon any changes.
    See Also:
    Follow, User
